text_1_facilitator.eng:
Whenever you can, pause, praise and reward yourself. And remember to connect with your family and friends - you are not alone.

Care for yourself every day. You matter!

rows.quiz_1_question: What can you do to take care of yourself today?
rows.media_title: How it helped a parent like you:
rows.media_transcript:
For me as a parent, it was almost impossible to find time for myself. I was always busy taking care of everyone else. When I started to @global.app_name helped push me to try to take better care of myself â€“ even just a little bit at a time. It helpeds me AND my family! 

Having a moment for myself helps me to breathe and notice how I feel. For me, five minutes to have a cup of tea makes a big difference. Now I can deal with my stress better.
